imdb.plot outline: Viewers around the world can once again watch - and participate in - the one-of-a-kind interviews that only Larry King can do. Larry brings you newsmakers of every stripe -- not just world leaders and celebrities from entertainment, pop culture and sports, but also regular people changing the world or caught in the crossfire of the most exciting and the biggest stories of the day. Fun and quirky field segments will treat Larry King's fans both old and new to a rarely seen side of Larry's personal humor and wit.
imdb.title: Larry King Now
plot: Larry King continues his brand of talk with "_Larry King Now_ (qv)" on Ora TV & Hulu::Anonymous
